mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (rev_no, rmem_no, rstore_no, rev_date, rev_people, rev_start, rev_end, rev_status, rev_request, rev_name, rev_phone) VALUES (1, #{rmemNo}, #{rstoreNo}, DEFAULT, #{revPeople}, TO_DATE(#{revStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{revEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'N', #{revRequest}, #{revName}, #{revPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT REV_NO, RMEM_NO, RSTORE_NO, REV_DATE, REV_PEOPLE, REV_START, REV_END, REV_STATUS, REV_REQUEST, REV_NAME, REV_PHONE, STORE_NAME FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN STORE ON RSTROE_NO = STORE_NO WHERE R.RMEM_NO = #{memNo}
